message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what you're currently paying for similar items. I'm extending this opportunity to you with a special offer. For a limited time, you can purchase our product for $135. This is a fantastic deal considering its worth to you is $120. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can finalize the transaction.
